attributes.action: The reopening of steam and sauna rooms in public gyms in Glasgow/Scotland
attributes.additional_details: The COVID-19 pandemic has been a significant inconvenience and source of stress for many people. It's well-known fact, steam and sauna rooms offer numerous health and wellness benefits, including reducing stress and anxiety, boosting the immune system, improving cardiovascular health, and relieving muscle pain and stiffness. Additionally, using these facilities can help improve skin health and promote relaxation, which is important for maintaining physical and mental well-being.
attributes.background: We want you give the greenlight to get things back in order with the steam and sauna rooms

rejection.details: All Covid rules and restrictions have been lifted in Scotland, and it is up to individual businesses whether and when to reopen their facilities, including steam and sauna rooms.
